events.title: Board Games and Pizza Night
events.abstract: Traditionally well attended and popular with members, this event is a great way to relax for a couple of hours and get some tasty pizza!

events.title: Garden Party
events.abstract:
The Archimedeans are pleased to announce that our annual garden party will be taking place on the 14th of June at the CMS. Featuring a BBQ, strawberries, Pimms, origami and frisbee, the garden party is set to be the biggest maths society event of the year

Tickets are £8 for members and £10 for non-members, but make sure to get your tickets early because the first 35 tickets bought before the 31st of May are for the discounted price of £5!

Tickets are available here
